DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate immunogenicity , safety tolerability 2 dose FLUAD-H5N1 vaccine compare 2 dos trivalent , interpandemic FLUAD , administer 3 week apart .
DOC.brief_title: Immunogenicity , Safety Tolerability Two Doses FLUAD-H5N1 Influenza Vaccine Adult Elderly Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy Subjects 18 year age sign informed consent Receipt another investigational agent within 4 week Receipt influenza vaccination current season 2006/2007 . acute disease infection , history neurological symptom sign , know suspected impairment immune function , serious disease , bleed diathesis fever ( defined axillary temperature ³38.0°C ) within 3 day ( prior Visit 1 ) Pregnant breastfeed female childbearing potential refuse use acceptable method birth control Surgery plan study period Hypersensitivity egg , chicken protein , chicken feather , influenza viral protein , neomycin polymyxin component study vaccine Receipt another vaccine within 3 week prior Visit 1 plan vaccination within 3 week follow last study vaccination History ( current ) drug alcohol abuse Any condition , , opinion Investigator , might interfere evaluation study objective .
